column5: Rob,  My deepest sympathies to you and your family.
Rob, My condolences to you and your family.....

Chris's will power and spirit was inspiring... Your strength is uncomprehendable...  My thoughts and prayers will be with your family...  I hug my boys even tighter these days... May you always carry with you every smile, every laugh, and all the wonderful moments.  Jen
Your story and your son will never be forgotten by me. As a father i'm always reminded. Godspeed

Rob, My deepest condolences to your family.. We have been praying all this time that it would be defeated, but I guess we were wrong. The young man is now at ease and in know more pain.. God rest his little body..
So sorry to hear this Rob,  you and your boy were always in my prayers.  Mark

Rob,  My deepest Sympathies to you and your family. Words fail me now, I know the hurt you and your family are feeling.  The hardest is to bury your child, it is not supposed to happen that way. Earlier words have said what I was thinking.  John
My condolences to you and your family on your loss.  Simon

Rob, We have never met to my knowledge, but I do recall your earlier posts last year regarding Chris's illness. I am terribly sorry for your loss and you have my deepest condolences. Please remain strong.  Brian
I am so sorry for your loss, words can't say or mean enough. My only advice is to keep the good memories close and, as John said so well, think of what Chris would want for you.  Dan
